Home / About UA92 / Our Founders / Our Partners




OUR
          PARTNERS        





SUPPORTING US IN DEVELOPING FUTURE TALENT, OUR PARTNERS ARE INTEGRAL TO THE UA92 EXPERIENCE.


WE ARE PROUD TO WORK WITH THE BRIGHTEST AND THE BEST brands IN THE DIGITAL, BUSINESS, MEDIA AND SPORTING SECTORS. OUR INDUSTRY PARTNERS NOT ONLY CODEVELOP OUR CURRICULUM BUT ARE AN INTEGRAL PART OF THE LEARNING EXPERIENCE.
AT UA92, PROVIDING STUDENTS WITH GUEST LECTURES, INDUSTRY INSIGHT DAYS, MENTORS AND MASTERCLASSES. SOME MAY OFFER PART-TIME WORK AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO UA92 STUDENTS.





MANCHESTER UNITED
Working closely with us to provide work experience and mentors, we are the proud education and employment partner of internationally renowned football club Manchester United.
This partnership is a chance for us to support the club’s longer-term recruitment plans and help attract young people from across Greater Manchester and beyond who come from a range of different backgrounds, working together to engage and encourage local communities into education pathways.
UA92 students benefit from placements across a range of departments at the Club, based just up the road in Old Trafford.





KPMG
KPMG firms operate in 145 different countries and territories across the globe, offering audit, tax, and advisory services.
Providing invaluable insight into their world of work, KPMG support UA92 with a comprehensive selection of skills workshops, guest lectures and work placements.
Their knowledgeable teams offer invaluable insight via a comprehensive and successful mentoring programme. The team has worked closely with UA92 since its inception.
 





MICROSOFT
Digital literacy is the heart of our Microsoft partnership, with our Shared Goals Agreement enhancing the digital skills of our quadruple threat graduates.
Microsoft are embedded across all aspects of teaching and learning at UA92, from the Microsoft Teams learning platform we use, to the Microsoft qualifications that form part of our Computer Science student’s degree and the access to Microsoft Office training all students receive.
We work closely with Microsoft in bringing the curriculum to life, including live project briefs, work placements and guest speaker sessions. We also work together on widening access to digital skills and Microsoft are key partners in the development of our Digital Academy.





TALKTALK
Telecoms giant TalkTalk are a key employer in Manchester and work with us to help develop emerging talent to build a pipeline of graduates into their business.
TalkTalk have a particular focus on character and personal development skills and support with the delivery of our CPD modules, providing project briefs and guest speaker sessions to bring to life the importance of interpersonal skills in the workplace. TalkTalk strengthen the learning experience in our business, media, and digital programmes by delivering guest speaker sessions, placements, projects, and mentoring.
We also work closely with TalkTalk on our social mobility mission, widening access and opportunity into Higher Education pathways through a variety of routes, including our Make it for Real campaign.





LANCASHIRE CRICKET CLUB
As Lancashire Cricket’s Official Higher Education partner, UA92 and its students are all members of this international sporting organisation.  Not only do students benefit from mentors, guest lectures and experience days, they can enjoy unique experiences in the state of the art television and radio press galleries in the Player and Media centre, work opportunities and the potential for an internship.









Led by the Class of 92, Salford City Football Club are a Sports partner of UA92 with the coaching, physio and management teams all getting involved in bringing teaching to life in the classroom.

SALFORD CITY FC







Co-owned by two UA92 co-founders Gary Neville and Ryan Giggs, GG Hospitality houses Hotel Football, Café Football, and the Stock Exchange, Manchester which are all part of a fast-paced industry. The business supports UA92 with part-time jobs for our students, as well as career pathways into hospitality with further support in the classroom and at recruitment events too.

GG HOSPITALITY







Leading financial firm Sedulo have a mission to create positive change in the communities they work in, seeing them provide donations, free services, and sponsorship for local charities.

The core values of Sedulo align closely with our own, and they provide unique work experience opportunities for our students, as well as partner with us on network events to promote collaboration, innovation, and community engagement in Manchester.

SEDULO







As a long-term business committed to the region, Bruntwood recognises the critical importance of developing talent, and retaining and attracting the best jobs to the city region. Our partnership is a fantastic opportunity to improve community facilities and create a place that encourages talent and business to come together.

BRUNTWOOD







JD Group is committed to providing young people with opportunities and our partnership with UA92 will equip future talent with the skills required to fulfil their potential.

Based in the Greater Manchester area, our JD People team will work closely with UA92 to develop and present content as well as providing work experience and placement opportunities.

We will also sponsor a number of first-generation students from deprived areas through a bursary, providing support during their studies to help to secure future employment.

We are immensely proud of this partnership and look forward to contributing towards the future of UA92 students.


JD GROUP







Gateley is a legal and professional services group which has provided commercial legal services to individuals and businesses over the last 200 years. With over 1,400 people, including 750 professional advisers, across 15 offices throughout the UK, Gateley is working closely with UA92 to support learners who are ambitious for success and keen to fulfil their potential. 
 
In 2015, Gateley were the first commercial UK law firm to list on the London Stock Exchange’s Alternative Investment Market (AIM). Its purpose is to deliver results that delight their clients, inspire their people and support their communities.

GATELEY

Book a Campus Tour
Want to see our campus and find out more about life at UA92? Book a campus tour between Monday 19th – Friday 23rd August. This is a great opportunity to ask all your questions and see everything for yourself.
BOOK A TOUR




THIS IS THE PLACE TO UNLOCK YOUR GREATNESS


AT UA92 WE SEE THINGS DIFFERENTLY. WE BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF YOU. THAT FIRE, GRIT AND DETERMINATION MATTER MUCH MORE THAN TALENT ALONE.
We know that it’s not always possible to visit us at our campus in Manchester, so the information here is designed to help you find out as much as possible about us virtually.





TAKE A CLOSERLOOK

THEDIFFERENCE
THEFACILITIES
YOURLEARNING
WHOWE ARE








THE UA92DIFFERENCE


WE’LL HELP YOU REALISE SKILLS YOU NEVER KNEW YOU HAD ON A JOURNEY OF SELF-EVOLUTION AND ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE.
Prepare to unlock your greatness and find your place in the real world of work.



 




GAME-CHANGINGFACILITIES


Our Old Trafford campus is an accessible, modern environment with a friendly atmosphere.

It’s complete with purpose-built spaces that offer a variety of learning environments, equipped with contemporary technology to enhance the way you learn. Microsoft, one of our industry partners, has its own space in the building too – so we’re in good company.




 


THE PERFORMANCE HUB
 

THE MEDIA LAB
 






YOURLEARNINGEXPERIENCE


With character and personal development at the heart of the UA92 experience, we focus on personalised learning with each student having their own personal development coach. Beyond this, students also have access to well-being support and with small class sizes you won’t just be a number.

















UA92 Business School





Tour the Business School
 

Located in Manchester city-centre, the UA92 Business School is next door to Manchester’s thriving business district, Spinningfields.
It’s our central hub for World of Business students. The Business School delivers degrees and courses across Business, Finance, Management, Marketing and Accounting.
Find out more





CLASS OF 92
LANCASTER
OUR PARTNERS



The Class of 92 – which includes UA92 co-founders, Gary and Phil Neville, Ryan Giggs, Paul Scholes and Nicky Butt, co-founded UA92 on the principles that influenced their success at Manchester United.
These have formed the founding principles of UA92 and underpin the philosophy as well as shaping the UA92 experience. They are an active part of the UA92 team and often deliver sessions to our students.
MORE


LANCASTER UNIVERSITY PLAY A HUGE ROLE IN THE ACADEMIC RIGOUR WE PROVIDE TO OUR STUDENTS.
Successful completion of your studies at UA92 will mean you are awarded a renowned Lancaster University degree, whilst studying via UA92’S distinctive approach. It’s the best of both worlds.
MORE


WE TEAM UP WITH LEADING INDUSTRY PARTNERS TO DEVELOP THE FUTURE TALENT THEY’RE HOPING TO EMPLOY.
From Manchester United to Microsoft, KPMG and more, our partners co-develop our curriculum, offer placements, industry insight days, guest lectures and masterclasses and some even offer part-time work experiences and scholarships to our students.
MORE

Home / Discover UA92 / Student Life




STUDENT
          LIFE        





YOUR EXPERIENCE, YOUR WAY.


Student life is what you make it.
HERE ARE JUST SOME OF THE WAYS YOU KEEP YOURSELF HEALTHY, TAKE CARE OF YOUR WELL-BEING AND MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR TIME OUTSIDE THE CLASSROOM.







BE PHYSICALLY ACTIVE
Healthy body, healthy mind! Take part in fitness activities from dance classes to run club. You don’t have to be a pro just come with a pair of trainers and have fun. A sure-fire way to boost your energy levels and get blood pumping to your brain!





BE SUPPORTED
We’ve got your back! Additional support for disabled students and students with learning difficulties, long-term illness or mental health conditions. Keep your well-being in check with access to on-campus support, guidance and counselling.





BE PART OF SOMETHING
Have a hobby? Start a society or join a club. It’s a great way to learn new skills, meet like-minded people and boost your self-confidence.





STEP UP AND MAKE A DIFFERENCE
Have something to say? Become a student ambassador or course rep. Help shape the future UA92 experience and enhance your communication and leadership skills at the same time.





TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR FUTURE
Don’t wait until graduation! Make the most of your personal coaching session, commit to your personal development, explore every opportunity and make steps towards your future career.





THERE’S SO MUCH TO LOVE ABOUT LIVING IN GREATER MANCHESTER AND PLENTY OF REASONS TO MAKE IT YOUR HOME.


THE BEST CITY IN THE WORLD?
WE THINK SO









HOME TO TWO PREMIER LEAGUE FOOTBALL TEAMS, MANCHESTER IS ENTRENCHED IN SPORTING GREATNESS. OUR LOCATION IN THE HEART OF OLD TRAFFORD PUTS US RIGHT ON THE DOORSTEP OF WORLD-CLASS SPORTING VENUES LIKE OLD TRAFFORD AND EMIRATES OLD TRAFFORD CRICKET GROUND, HOME TO OUR PARTNERS MANCHESTER UNITED AND LANCASHIRE CRICKET CLUB . 

LEGENDARY SPORT







Manchester Is renowned for Its style and shopping. The UK’s largest indoor shopping centre, The Trafford Centre, Is just 10 minutes away from our campus and high street stores and designer boutiques line Market Street, King Street and St Anne’s Square in the city centre.

SUPERB SHOPPING







MANY OF THE UK’S BEST BANDS HAVE ORIGINATED FROM MANCHESTER AND OLD TRAFFORD, FROM STONE ROSES TO OASIS. BIG NAMES LINE UP TO PLAY TOP CONCERT VENUES AND FESTIVALS ACROSS THE CITY WITH LOCATIONS LIKE DEANSGATE, ANCOATS AND NORTHERN QUARTER ALL BRINGING VIBRANT NIGHTLIFE TOO. 

MUSIC AND NIGHTLIFE







MANCHESTER IS STEEPED IN HISTORY. STROLL AROUND THE ROMAN RUINS IN CASTLEFIELD OR VISIT THE ICONIC MANCHESTER CATHEDRAL. A HOST OF ART GALLERS, MUSEUMS AND CULUTURAL SPACES CELEBRATE THE HISTORY AND CREATIVITY OF THIS UNIQUE CITY. 

ARTS & CULTURE

OUR
          CAMPUSES        






BE INSPIRED BY YOUR SURROUNDINGS. DISCOVER YOUR POTENTIAL.


Study your industry inspired course, with access to industry leading technology and equipment, in a city with unlimited opportunities.
Our Manchester based campuses are modern, vibrant, accessible and creative hubs that inspire ambition and collaboration.






























DISCOVER OUR OLD TRAFFORD CAMPUS IN MANCHESTER
This is where our story began, back in 2019. The UA92 Campus is in the heart of Old Trafford, Manchester. Inside there’s a fully equipped Sports Performance Centre, Media Studio and Digital Academy. The tram stop is a 1 minute walk, which gets you into the heart of Manchester city-centre in under 10 minutes.
Find Us
UA92 Old Trafford Campus
Brian Statham Way
Old Trafford
Manchester UK
M16 0PU

DISCOVER OUR UA92 BUSINESS SCHOOL IN MANCHESTER
Our game-changing UA92 Business School in the city-centre of Manchester opened in September 2023. As our central hub for enterprise, it will transform the way we deliver our Business and Accounting courses. The campus is in the heart of Manchester’s thriving business district, less than one minute from Salford Central train station, and well connected to the rest of Manchester and beyond.

Home / Discover UA92 / Our Campuses / Old Trafford Campus




OLD TRAFFORD
          CAMPUS        



















A VIBRANT HUB OF ACTIVITY AND CREATIVITY
This is a place where students come to learn, discover and grow into work-ready, highly employable graduates of the future. 
Based in the heart of Old Trafford, Manchester, the UA92 Old Trafford campus opened its doors in 2019. The campus is a modern environment with a friendly atmosphere, offering you the perfect home for your studies. Equipped with the latest, industry-grade technology and digital learning resources, it really is a campus of the 21st century, in a city with unlimited potential.
Find a Course







WHY STUDY AT OLD TRAFFORD CAMPUS








The Old Trafford campus is an impressive and inspiring place to learn and collaborate. As well as the amazing teaching facilities, there are many different areas for group or private study.  It's a thriving hub of activity with a high-level of energy.

INSPIRING SPACES







The Old Trafford campus is in a great location and within easy reach of Manchester city-centre. You have a great view of Emirate's Old Trafford, home of Lancashire Cricket and can easily walk to Old Trafford Football Ground. The local area has great access to public transport and cycle routes to get you around the city.

GREAT LOCATION







Grab a coffee or a bite to eat at our on-site Cafe 92. There are plenty of dedicated spaces on campus, whether you want to catch up on some uni work or take a break. If you like a bit of friendly competition then challenge your friend to a game of table tennis or teq-ball. 

STUDY & SOCIAL SPACE







If you like to workout, then the student Fitness Zone is for you. For a small monthly membership fee, you can have access to this brand new, on-campus, gym and fitness facility. It's a great place to burn off some steam before or after your lessons.


Gym & Fitness Zones




OLD TRAFFORD CAMPUS FACILITIES
















DIGITAL ACADEMY
A state-of-the-art facility, the Digital Academy is located on the 2nd floor and is home to our Digital students. You will find some cool tech, including a 360 degree immersive audio and video environment, augmented and virtual reality zone, digital labs and a quirky indoor green space for smaller group working and events.

















PERFORMANCE CENTRE
The Performance Centre is located on the lower ground level and is made up of four areas. The Performance Hub is used exclusively for teaching on the sports courses. Sports students have access to high-spec strength and conditioning equipment, sport science technology and performance analysis apparatus.

















MEDIA STUDIO
The Media Studio has remote operated cameras, software controlled lighting, autocue and a broadcast gallery, giving you all the tools you need to create industry level productions. The podcast room, sound desk and digital audio workstation (DAW) means you can broadcast to the world with the very best quality output.











"The UA92 Digital Academy will be a catalyst in Greater Manchester’s digital ecosystem, working with world leading tech partners to develop and inspire talent in DevOps, Cloud, Linux, data science, cyber security, AR, VR and AI."
Aaron Saxton - Director of Disruptive Learning









COLLABORATION WITH INDUSTRY
The UA92 Old Trafford Campus is home to Microsoft’s Headquarters in the North of England. Many of our other key partnerships are within close proximity of the campus including Manchester United and Lancashire Cricket.
Our Partners





Where is the UA92 Old Trafford Campus



The Old Trafford Campus is within easy reach of Manchester city-centre. It is close to the famous international sports venues Old Trafford football stadium (the home of Manchester United) and Lancashire Cricket Club.





How do you get to the Old Trafford Campus?



The Old Trafford campus is well connected and has good transport links. The Old Trafford Metrolink stop is within a 1-minute walk which takes you into Manchester city-centre in approximately 10 minutes. This is where you can connect with the main rail network which gets you anywhere across the country.
Find out how to find the Old Trafford campus.





Is there parking available on campus?



There is only parking available on campus for visitors who hold a Blue Badge.
For any parking enquiries please email [email protected].





Is the Old Trafford Campus accessible?



The campus is open, spacious and completely accessible to everyone. With open spaces, lift access, designated parking and flexible teaching, break out and meeting spaces, the campus was designed with accessibility in mind. What’s more, the campus is accredited by AccessAble and you can get accurate information to assist with your visit from our detailed access guide.





What course can I study at the Old Trafford campus?



This campus is the main teaching space for our Worlds of Digital, Media and Sport. You can study a wide-range of courses including Sports Coaching, Computer Science and Sports Journalism. Explore all our courses.





Can I arrange a visit?



You can come and explore the campus at one of our Open Days throughout the year. Find out when our next Open Day is taking place.
If you can’t make it to an Open Day, you can request a Campus Tour. This is a 1-2-1 tour with a member of our Student Recruitment team.





Can I hire event space on campus?



Yes! We have a number of modern and versatile spaces that can be hired for all types of events and conferences. Find out more about booking space for an event.

Home / Discover UA92 / Our Campuses / UA92 Business School




UA92 Business
          School        

The game-changing UA92 Business School offers the UA92 experience in a Manchester city-centre location.



























A SPACE TO LEARN, COLLABORATE AND INNOVATE
Our game-changing UA92 Business School is located in Manchester city-centre. Right next door to Manchester’s thriving business district, Spinningfields.
It’s our central hub for World of Business students. The Business School delivers degrees and courses across Business, Finance, Management, Marketing and Accounting.
UA92 Business School offers a modern learning environment in an exciting city-centre location.
Search Courses





 

TOUR THE BUSINESS SCHOOL
Take a look at what goes on at the UA92 Business School.
Or if you’d like to visit the campus in person, you can book a campus tour.
Book a Tour







Why study at UA92 Business School?








Our 36,000 square foot Business School includes modern classrooms, breakout areas and collaboration spaces. You’ll get access to these first-class facilities while experiencing our inspiring and energetic UA92 campus culture.

Modern facilities







Our partners support our mission to develop work-ready graduates. They play a vital role in shaping the curriculum and provide work-place experiences to our students and graduates.

Industry partners







Alongside your academic studies you will complete the 92 Programme. The character and personal development focus days will develop your mindset, enhance your skillset and get you set for your future career.

More than a degree







Flexible spaces include classrooms, group study booths and social spaces. Students have access to modern kitchen facilities and fun games.

Student spaces








"The growth of our Business community is down to the success of our industry-inspired courses, our unique approach to learning, and the invaluable input from all our industry partners. The UA92 Business School provides specialist facilities for our business students to learn, study, work and collaborate."
Firoz Bhaiyat, Head of Business at UA92









UA92 Ignition
Are you are running a small business and need help with organising an event, preparing your year-end business accounts or developing a business plan?
The student-led UA92 Ignition offers Manchester-based businesses access to free advice and innovative ideas to support their business goals.
Find out more




In the local area

Food and drink
There are many cafes, restaurants, coffee shops, delis, takeaways, supermarkets and bars within a short distance, catering for a wide range of tastes and budgets.
Shopping
Spinningfields and King Street are just a short walk and offer a range of up-market clothing boutiques. Deansgate and Market Street have many of your high-street favourites. Or, venture into the Northern Quarter for vintage and second-hand stores.
Entertainment
You will have lots of fun and exciting things to do when you are not in class. There are music venues, cinemas, comedy stores, theatres and sports venues close by.


International students
Manchester ranks among the world’s best student cities. There’s more than 21,000 international students from more than 160 countries living and studying in Manchester.
Arts & Culture
There are countless attractions across the city including museums, art galleries, parks and gardens. Introduce yourself to Manchester’s history and heritage by joining a free walking tour of the city.
Business and industry
Manchester is one of the UK’s fastest growing cities and home to a diverse range of business and financial organisations. It’s just a short walk to Spinningfields, the heart of the city’s financial, professional and business services industry. It is home firms such as Barclays, Deloitte and Brewin Dolphin.




More about the UA92 Business School




Where is the UA92 Business School?



Our Business School is located in the heart of Manchester. The campus is right next door to the thriving business district, Spinningields, where you’ll find some of the biggest global finance businesses. Spinningfields is also a popular destination for food, entertainment and shopping.





What are the best ways to travel to the Business School?



By train
The closest train station is Salford Central which is within 1 minute walk of our Business School. Manchester Victoria is just 0.6 miles away (15 minute walk).
By Metrolink (tram)
There are a number of Metrolink stops within a mile of the campus.
St Peter’s Square (0.6 miles) offers direct trams on 6 of the 8 lines across Manchester.
By Bus
The campus is centrally located, therefore many major bus routes pass close by.  There’s also a free shuttle bus service around the city-centre.
More about how to find the UA92 Business School.





Is there anywhere to park at the UA92 Business School?



There is no student parking available at the Business School.
Browncross Street carpark is right next to the Business School and suitable for short visits. The pay and display carpark is operated by Euro Carparks.
There are a large number of public car parks located within easy walking distance of the Business School. The Parkopedia site details a number of these options.
Please be aware of driving restrictions on some of the roads in the local area.





What courses can I study at UA92 Business School?



You can study a wide range of Business, Finance, Marketing and Management degrees. Explore a full list of our Business Degrees.





Do you only offer degree-level courses?



You can choose to study the following:
Certificate of Higher Education – a 1 year course equivalent to the first year of a degree.
Honors Degree – a 3 year degree course. Degres awarded by Lancaster University.
Accelerated Honors Degree – fast-track your studies with our 2-year degree.

Home / Sport 92




SPORT
          92        






SPORT & PHYSICAL
ACTIVITY FOR ALL
SPORT 92 has something for everyone. Whether you want to play competitive sport or participate in social physical activity with like-minded people. Find out how you can get involved below.





Sport92 Clubs
Join one of our competitive sports clubs and represent UA92 in BUCS (British Universities and Colleges Sport) leagues and cup fixtures! Choose from football, basketball, netball, futsal, badminton, table tennis and cricket and join like minded students of all abilities training and competing every week in nearby facilities!
If your sport is not listed here, there’s always the option to set up a new club from scratch, and don’t worry – we have a team of sport development staff to help you!  
All of our clubs have head coaches employed to get the best of out of you, and are ran by elected student committees so we know we’re providing the best experience for you as a UA92 student.  
Especially interested in football or futsal? The UA92 football programme is growing from strength to strength. We’ve been awarded a 3 star rating from the BUCS football accreditation award after just 3 years – the highest possible rating, putting us in and amongst the top 16 institutions in the UK. There is something available for every student, male and female aspiring to play or work in the world of football and futsal. 
This rating showcases our inclusive programme across football and futsal, with lots of opportunities to get involved. You can play in one of our many competitive teams, you can take a referee course and officiate (or play in) our campus leagues and other weekend fixtures or you can be placed in a semi professional club and gain experience in a number of off pitch positions, as well as countless other opportunities! 






Physical Activity For All
It’s not all about competitive sport. We have loads of opportunities for you to get active across campus outside of our competitive sport offering.  Get UActive is our programme of free, fun and social physical activity.  
We have a wide ranging timetable, with new activities on offer every block, including: 

Pickleball


Indoor Football


Badminton


Exercise Classes


Table Tennis…and much more! 

There’s no commitment and no cost – it’s a great way to de-stress, make friends and try something new.  





The Fitness Zone 
The Performance Centre opened in April 2023 and is home to the Fitness Zone – a dedicated gym for UA92 students and staff. With top-quality equipment and a welcoming space, it’s the perfect place to reach your fitness goals on campus. 
To support your health and wellbeing, we now have a dedicated Gym and Physical Activity Officer on hand to offer expert advice, personalized programmes, and guided classes to keep you motivated. 
Join our range of fitness classes and activities, designed to help you stay fit, strong, and active: 

Learn to Lift – Build your confidence with weights 


Hybrid Class – A mix of functional strength and running 


Yoga & Relaxation – Improve flexibility and mental wellbeing 


Run Club – Join our community of runners for a social 5K 


Couch to 5K – A structured programme to help you start running 

No matter your fitness level, Sport92 is here to support you. Stay active, push your limits, and unlock your full potential. 
Follow Sport92 on Instagram (@sport92mcr) for the latest updates on Get UActive and Fitness Zone classes! 





Sport92 Talented Athlete Programme
UA92 have a small number of places on a Talented Athlete Programme on offer for student athletes who compete at a high level in their sport. Whilst athletes in team sports we compete in within BUCS (British Universities and Colleges Sport) leagues and individual sports will be prioritised, we welcome applications from any sport as long as you are competing at the appropriate level.
Being a Sport92 Talented Athlete, you could benefit from financial and additional support services to help you balance your academic and sporting commitments. This includes a gym membership, sport science support, equipment expenses and travel costs.
Are you currently a women’s footballer and aiming to be the next Lioness to lift a major trophy? With two women’s football places exclusively available, UA92 is the ideal place to come study whilst continuing your footballing career.
You can apply to be on the Talented Athlete Scheme by requesting an application form from [email protected].
We’re also proud to be a TASS Dual Career Accreditation site, showcasing our support for student athletes wishing to continue their education. For more information please visit here.





UA92 X CASTORE
University Academy 92 is delighted to announce a partnership with Castore to become our official kit supplier.
The British sportswear group has designed and manufactured a new set of kits, training wear and leisurewear for our new competitive sports clubs.
Castore was founded by Tom and Phil Beahon in 2015 and works with the likes of Salford City FC, Rangers, Newcastle United and Wolverhampton Wanderers, as well as supplying apparel for the McLaren Formula One team, England Cricket and Sir Andy Murray.
UA92 branded Castore kit is available to purchase from our online store.

Home / Discover UA92 / Accommodation




OUR STUDENT
          ACCOMMODATION        





MAKE THE
MOVE


If you’re planning on moving away from home, we have excellent accommodation options close to our Old Trafford Campus and UA92 Business School.
Both options offer stylish, modern, self-contained, full-furnished apartments with access to hyper fast WiFi and shared laundry facilities on-site.
The rent includes all utilities making it easier to manage your money.
Find out more about our student accommodation at Academy Apartments and One Cross Street below.





Academy Apartments
There are five different room types available at Academy Apartments. Prices starts from £175 per week for a Compact Studio.
*Prices vary dependant on length of tenancy (51 or 42 week tenancies available). All room costs include heating, electricity and Wi-fi bills and access to onsite laundry facilities.
** To register your interest in Academy Apartments, you will need to have firmly accepted your offer. Details on how to register your interest will be sent to you via email at the beginning of April.
View on Maps




TAKE A TOUR
 

COME AND TAKE A LOOK AROUND ACADEMY APARTMENTS. TAKE A VIDEO TOUR OF OUR STUDENT ACCOMMODATION WITH UA92 CO_FOUNDER, GARY NEVILLE.





Great Location for Campus Learning
Academy Apartments is located directly opposite our campus meaning you can be out of bed and in the classroom within two minutes. The rooms themselves have fantastic views of our campus and the homes of our partners: Lancashire Cricket Ground and Manchester United’s Old Trafford stadium.
The area is well-served by bus routes, tram links and has designated cycle lanes so you can easily access Manchester City Centre, Media City UK and Salford Quays too.




A PARENTSVIEW


WHEN YOUR CHILD LEAVES HOME TO PURSUE THEIR EDUCATION, IT REALLY IS A BIG DEAL. DON’T LET ANYONE TELL YOU OTHERWISE.
As a parent, you want them to make the right choices and be supportive of their decision. Going to the Open Day was really reassuring. The campus wasn’t too big as to be overwhelming and the quality of the student accommodation was a huge bonus. The staff were knowledgeable, honest and open to answering any questions. So, I was absolutely delighted when Elliott chose UA92. Even though he had other offers from places closer to home, it just felt ‘right.’
Jason | Parent






















One Cross Street
One Cross Street is a collection of fully-furnished modern apartments, located close to Manchester city-centre, just 0.3 miles (7-minute walk) from our UA92 Business School.
All contracts for One Cross Street are 51 weeks in length.
The building has an abundance of heritage features, including exposed brickwork, original beams, and large windows.
Apartments are fitted with luxury appliances and all utilities are included. Tenants also have access to shared laundry facilities, bike storage and hyperfast WiFi.
One Cross Street
Blackfriars Street
Salford
M3 7AG
View on Maps




TAKE A TOUR
 

COME AND TAKE A LOOK AROUND OUR CITY-CENTRE STUDENT ACCOMMODATION AT ONE CROSS STREET APARTMENTS, ONLY 7-MINUTES WALK FROM UA92 BUSINESS SCHOOL.





How are apartments allocated?



Academy Apartments:
When you register your interest, you will be asked for your preferred apartment type. Where possible, you will be allocated one of your preferred choices, however this cannot be guaranteed.
One Cross Street: 
All apartments at One Cross Street are 2-bedroom and available on a shared basis (2 people per apartment). All apartments are single-gender and bedrooms will be allocated by the accommodation team based on a range of factors. Students applying to live in student accommodation should expect to live with people from a variety of cultures and religions. Specific requests to share with friends may be considered.





Is There Security?  



To enter the grounds of the buildings, you will have a key fob or door code. Upon entering the buildings, fobs are then required again to enter, and you will have keys to your own room. Each room also has its own post-box downstairs that is secured with a keyless code system.
All buildings are comprehensively covered by CCTV for your own safety.





Are There Laundry Facilities?  



There are shared laundry facilities on-site, which are available to use free-of-charge.





What If I Have A Disability Or Special requirements?  



Please contact [email protected] to discuss your specific requirements.





HOW DO I APPLY? 



If you are due to start in September 2024, you will be able to register your interest for student accommodation from around 9 April 2024.
We will send an email with a link to an online form, which you must complete in full and submit before the closing date.
Once the window has closed, we will assess and allocate apartments. Please note that expressing interest is not a guaranteed booking.
The ‘Expression of Interest’ form will only be sent to applicants who have firmly accepted a place at UA92.

Home / Discover UA92 / Graduation 2025




CLASS OF UA92
          GRADUATION        














CONGRATS GRADS,
YOU SMASHED IT!
CLASS of 2024… GET READY FOR YOUR GREATNESS UNLOCKED GRADUATION.




Event Details 


Event Details
Things to do 
Attire 





When is Graduation?



Graduation for the Class of 2025 will be held on Saturday 28th June 2025.
Worlds of Sport and Digital will graduate in the morning, while Worlds of Business and Media will graduate in the afternoon.





Do I need to register to attend Graduation?



Yes you needed to register to attend Graduation. Details around registration will be provided on teams closer to the Graduation date.





Where will my graduation be held?



The UA92 Graduation event will take place on Saturday 28th June 2024 at Victoria Warehouse, Trafford Wharf Road, Manchester, M17 1AB.





Will there be a graduation afterparty?



Graduation afterparty details will be sent closer to the graduation date.







Nominate your fellow graduates 



Watch this space for details on how to nominate and vote for the Graduate Awards.
Greatness Unlocked Award:
For living the UA92 values and success in character and personal development. 
This award is for a stand-out student, who has shown commitment to their own Character and Personal Development. 
The winner will be announced at graduation.
Student of the Year 2024:
For outstanding contribution to academic and student life at UA92.

This award is for the student who has made a significant contribution to the UA92 experience. Whether that’s by being a student rep, student ambassador, content creator, Sport92 club member or other activities.
The winner will be announced at graduation.





Arrange a Visa letter



You may wish to invite your friends and family to the UK to attend your Graduation ceremony.
They will need to apply for their own Standard Visitor Visa and you can find details here.

If you wish to invite your family and friends to your Graduation ceremony, you will need to send them a short invitation letter from you, confirming your relationship with them and the reason you are inviting them to come to the UK


You will need to provide confirmation from University Academy 92 (UA92) that you have successfully completed your degree course of studies and that you are attending your graduation ceremony in the UK. You can do this by emailing [email protected]
UA92 can provide an invitation letter confirming a student’s eligibility to attend their ceremony.
Once you have requested this and have registered for your ceremony, you will be emailed this letter.

A Standard Visitor Visa can be issued for up to six months and will more than cover the length of time they need to be in the UK for your Graduation.







How do I hire my graduation robe?



Watch this space for more information about gown hire!
You will collect your robe on the day of your graduation. There will be people on hand to help with robing.
 





What should I wear to Graduation?



Graduation is a special occasion, so graduates and guests are invited to dress their best. All UA92 graduates are required to wear a graduation cap and gown at their ceremony.
If you have any questions about this contact [email protected].
A buttoned shirt or blouse is ideal for attaching your hood to. But if your clothes do not have buttons, pins will be provided to secure your hood.
































A look back at the Class of ’24
Our Class of 24 officially unlocked their greatness last summer. Have a look back on their incredible graduation day!
See the highlights





UA92 Alumni Community 
After graduation you will automatically join our alumni community, keeping you connected to UA92 for life. We’ll also stay in touch to hear more about your life after graduation, while keeping you up to date with the latest UA92 news and events. 
Get in touch at [email protected] to see how we can help. 
We’d love to keep in touch so make sure you keep your contact details up to date. You can let us know about any changes to your contact information by completing this form.

HIRE EVENT SPACE
          AT UA92        






A CAMPUS OF THE 21ST CENTURY WITH UNLIMITED POTENTIAL.
An iconic building in the Old Trafford and Manchester landscape, the former Kellogg’s building is now home of UA92.
The UA92 campus is a hub of energy, activity and creativity. The incredible, modern and versatile space can be hired for all types of events and conferences.
The large open plan events space, 146-seater auditorium, multiple break-out rooms and private meeting areas, provide the perfect spaces to hire for your organisations next event or conference.
Want to hire space at UA92, email us at [email protected], or book on Vivify using the link below.
Book a space 




FIND YOUR SPACE AT UA92






EVENTS & CONFERENCES





DIGITAL ACADEMY





MEETING ROOMS





WORKSHOPS AND ACTIVITES





EVENT TESTIMONIAL 
 

YOUNG ENTERPRISE
Young Enterprise chose to host their North West Start-up Finals at UA92. We utilised multiple event spaces to deliver this large-scale event, which brought together 10 universities from across the North West.
Young Enterprise’s Start Up Lead, Suzanne Lockwood, explains why they chose UA92 as the venue for their regional finals.
ENQUIRE NOW















EVENTS & CONFERENCES
The ultimate event space for all occasions and event types. The Events suite has a capacity of up to 180 delegates. It’s a versatile, modern, blank canvas event space, that can be customised to suit your needs.
The Events suite is fitted with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment and high speed internet with dual connections for reliability and security. Additional bespoke events solutions and audio visual services can be provided, based on your requirements.
We understand that each event is unique, and we pride ourselves on our flexibility and creativity. The UA92 events team is here to work with you every step of the way and deliver an event that exceeds your expectations. We have the resources and expertise to ensure that your event is a success.
Hire the Event Suite for your next event, whether you’re planning a corporate function, a private celebration or a community gathering.
ENQUIRE NOW















THE AUDITORIUM
A versatile theatre-style auditorium with a seating capacity of up to 146 people. This is the perfect space for a range of events such as team talks, strategy downloads, movie nights, key note presentations, panel discussions, performances and much more.
Our tiered seating arrangement provides excellent sight-lines and acoustics. The event space is fitted with state-of-the-art audio visual equipment, optional additional screens and high speed internet with dual connections for reliability and security.
Hire the auditorium for your next event, whether you’re hosting a keynote speaker or a live performance.
ENQUIRE NOW















THE DECK
This unique, open plan event space can accommodate up to 80 people standing and 60 people seated cabaret.
The spacious and contemporary design and iconic panoramic glass ceiling feature, makes it the perfect venue for hosting networking events, team away days, workshops and dinners.
Hire The Deck for a flexible and adaptable space that can be tailored to meet your specific needs.
ENQUIRE NOW




































DIGITAL ACADEMY
A cutting-edge event space with modern and ‘instagram worthy’ features.
This new state-of-the-art facility includes a 360 degree immersive audio and video environment, augmented reality and virtual reality zone, digital labs and a quirky indoor green space.
Each area offers a unique experience, and collectively creates a flexible event space that has the wow factor.
ENQUIRE NOW















THE IGLOO
A cutting-edge, customisable 360 degree immersive audio and visual space. Looking for a unique venue for your next  meeting, presentation, training day or workshop? The Igloo provides an immersive, engaging and deliberately different space.
Hire the Igloo at UA92. It’s the perfect place to collaborate, innovate, and inspire your colleagues and delegates.
ENQUIRE NOW















THE GREEN SPACE
A large contemporary, open plan collaboration zone, designed to bring the outside in. This communal and connected space is at the heart of the Digital Academy.
The dynamic event space provides the perfect setting for a range of events such as presentations, drinks receptions, product showcases plus much more. Fitted with state-of-the-art technology, audio-visual equipment, super high-speed Wi-Fi and digital signage screens, it’s ideal for interactive events or as a break out space.
Hire the Green Space for your next event – the possibilities are endless!
ENQUIRE NOW






























WORKSHOPS & ACTIVITES
The building has many functional teaching spaces that can be transformed into event spaces. Our classrooms are flexible and adaptable, providing an ideal setting for workshops, team away days, and other interactive events.
The learning suites are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including audio-visual equipment and high-speed, reliable Wi-Fi. They can accommodate up to 60 guests, therefore providing the perfect venue for small to medium-sized events, training sessions or meetings.
ENQUIRE NOW
























MEETING ROOMS
Our bright and airy meeting rooms have full digital conferencing, meeting and webcasting capabilities. With in -room refreshments you’ll find the perfect environment to take on any challenge or innovate the next big thing.
Our Board Room offers plentiful space for larger group meetings and all the connectivity you’d expect, with smart break out areas and in room refreshments provided.
ENQUIRE NOW

THE GREAT NORTHERN CONFERENCE
UA92 had the pleasure of hosting the Great Northern Conference in November 2022. The event brings together key politicians, business leaders, media and thought provoking influencers from Greater Manchester area and beyond.
Lauren White from National World, said “This has been running for 4 years and in 2022 we held it for the first time in Manchester.
My experience with UA92 has been great. From the start Deena was on hand to help me envisage the event taking place here. I am based in Scotland, so Deena was very accommodating in showing me the space in person as well as via video call. The event space was a different concept to what we have done before but with the imagination of the UA92′ team we were able to utilise the full facility and bring our vision to life. All of the staff I dealt with on the day of the event as well as in advance were very professional, quick at replying and more than happy to look into any requests we had.
Overall, I would highly recommend UA92 to anyone who is looking for a unique venue with a dedicated team to guide you through it all . I appreciate the dedication of the events team as well as the institution’s commitment to providing a smooth running and exceptional event.”
ENQUIRE NOW

UA92 For
          Your Business        






EVENTS & CONFERENCES
A CAMPUS OF THE 21ST CENTURY WITH UNLIMITED POTENTIAL.
What was formally the old Kellogg’s building is now what we call home.
The UA92 campus is a hub of activity and creativity, with incredible, modern space that you can make the most of.
From our large events space to our auditorium, right through to our digital academy launching September 2022 and our private, gated car park, there’s so much to the UA92 campus that could be of benefit to your organisation or event.
Want to hire space at UA92, email us at [email protected].
Email now









DIGITAL ACADEMY
OUR NEW STATE-OF-THE-ART DIGITAL ACADEMY OPENED IN SEPTEMBER 2022.
The UA92 Digital Academy will be a catalyst in Greater Manchester’s Digital ecosystem, working with world-leading tech partners to develop and inspire talent in DevOps, Linux, data science, cyber security, AR, VR and AI.
For more information or how to get involved, contact [email protected].









APPRENTICESHIPS
MORE THAN JUST A HIGHER EDUCATION PROVIDER.
It’s important that students have access to higher education which equips them with the skills that are sought by employers. At UA92 we are developing plans to introduce digital apprenticeships, allowing our students to access an employer-led, industry curriculum, no matter their background.









SCHOOLS, COLLEGES, AND THE COMMUNITY
YOUR PATH TO GREATNESS STARTS HERE
We aim to guide students in making an informed and balanced decision on their route into Higher Education.
Whether you want to visit our campus, or we come to visit yours, our Student Futures Team provide expert information, advice, and guidance on a range of topics through workshops, presentations, talks and events.
Hear more from our team over on our blog, check out the latest community events or see our full outreach menu here.
Get in touch with us at [email protected] to book a session or to discuss how we can support you.

MORE


WHY UA92?
Parents & guardians can rest assured that at UA92, students gain an education like no other. Our curriculum is co-developed with industry and our partners, and students gain a respected qualification in the form of a degree awarded by academic pioneers Lancaster University.
Along the way, students will take a personal journey of development, discover new capabilities and confidence, and develop their emotional, social, physical, and cognitive intelligence. All this combines to help your bright spark become tomorrow’s success story.









FINDING THE RIGHT COURSE
Choosing the right course can be a difficult decision for some students.
Our courses focus in four key subject areas: Sport, Business, Media and Digital. We also offer many different levels of study, so encourage you to explore our course options below. Find out everything you need to know from modules studied to the course content and how it’s taught.
MORE




ACCOMMODATION
This may be the first time your child has lived away from home, and we understand how much of a big deal that really is.
VIEW


Rest assured, our student accommodation is safe, secure, and just a stone’s throw away from our campus. Both options on offer to UA92 students offer stylish and modern, self-contained studio apartments which come fully furnished including a double bed, study area, en-suite, and kitchen; none of which is shared with other students.
“The accommodation at UA92 is top end. Think more ‘young professional’ than ‘student digs’. With all mod cons in apartments as standard, it’s one less thing to worry about as a parent.” – Jason Pettigrove UA92 Parent




THEIR APPLICATION
Students can apply to join UA92 either through UCAS or directly to us.
 
APPLY


Applying to higher education can be daunting and whilst your child’s school or college should support them with their application, we encourage you to do so too by keeping up to date with Key Dates and UCAS deadlines.
The support doesn’t just stop there though, as our Student Recruitment team are more than happy to help with any questions either you or your child should have related to their application. Email [email protected].
For more information on how the application process works or to help your child begin their application, click the button below.





FINANCE
SUPPORT
VISIT US



We understand that student finance, and particularly your child managing their own finances, can be a scary thought. Our student teams are always on hand to help your child should they be struggling or need some advice.
We also offer multiple different support packages , to help your child access higher education without any financial barriers.
From student loans to maintenance loans and how to apply, you can find all the information you need on our Fees and Finance Page.
VIEW


We take pride in our well-being services for our students, and the support we offer them throughout their time studying with us.
Should your child have a condition that could affect their ability to study, this should be disclosed on either their UCAS application, or self-referred to our Inclusive Support Service as soon as possible by emailing [email protected].
Our aim is to remove barriers and provide an inclusive environment to all students, with support, counselling, and other services available to them should it be required.
“I really feel like UA92 is one big support bubble. There are regular sessions every week. One of my favourite sessions is Tea & Talk on a Wednesday afternoon. It’s really relaxed and informal and you feel comfortable talking to people.” – Abz, UA92 Student.
VIEW


Don’t just take our word for it – come and visit us yourself to see what life at UA92 is really like for your child.
Our Open Days are the perfect opportunity for you to experience UA92 first-hand. If you can’t make it – don’t worry! You can book your own personal campus tour of UA92 with our team too.
“Going to the Open Day was really reassuring. The campus wasn’t too big, as to be overwhelming, and the quality of the student accommodation was a huge bonus. The staff were knowledgeable, honest, and open to answering any questions.” – Jason Pettigrove, UA92 Parent
 
VIEW

Home / Help & Guidance / Student Support & Well-being




Student Support
          & Well-being        





WHATEVER YOU NEED, WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK.


FROM BEFORE YOU START RIGHT UP UNTIL YOU GRADUATE, WE HAVE DEDICATED STUDENT SUPPORT SERVICES AVAILABLE, INCLUDING MENTAL HEALTH AND 1-2-1 COUNSELLING SESSIONS WITH OUR TEAM.









MENTAL HEALTH AND
STUDENT SUPPORT
Whether you have a diagnosed mental health condition, are finding it hard to adjust to student life or you’re just struggling in general, please remember that firstly, you are not alone and secondly, support is always available to you.
Our students’ well-being is important to us and our Student Support team are always on hand to give you support, guidance and counselling should you need it. You can arrange a confidential 1-2-1 appointment to discuss any personal matters.
Need to get in touch? You can email us at [email protected].









INCLUSIVE SUPPORT
We believe that nothing should hold you back from unlocking your greatness. Whether you have a specific learning difficulty, a long-term health condition, mental health condition or any other disability or additional needs, our team are here to support you and minimise any barriers to your success.
Need to get in touch with our Inclusive Support team? Email [email protected].
 




IN A CRISIS?
NEED HELP FAST?
In an emergency, call 999




SUPPORT LINES
SUICIDE & MENTAL HEALTH HELPLINES
DOMESTIC VIOLENCE HELPLINES 
RAPE CRISIS  





Samaritans

Freephone 116 123

Available 24/7, 365 days a year should you need to talk about anything at all confidentially



SHOUT Crisis Text Line

Text SHOUT to 85258 for free

Available 24/7, 365 days a year should you be experiencing a personal crisis and need support



Student Space

Run by Student Minds, contact Student Space to receive support via text, phone, webchat or email to find appropriate support





Papyrus Hopeline

Call 0800 068 4141

Text 07860 039967

Open 9am – midnight every day (including weekends and bank holidays)

Hopeline UK is for people under 35 who are experiencing thoughts of suicide and for anyone concerned that a young person is considering suicide.



CALM (Campaign Against Living Miserably)

Call 0800 58 58 58 or webchat

Available 5pm to midnight, 365 days a year for men who are feeling down and need to talk or seek support





National Domestic Violence Helpline

Freephone 0800 2000 247

Available 24/7 to women



Men’s Advice Line

Freephone 0808 801 0327

Men’s Advice Line is now open Mon-Fri 10am-8pm



ManKind

Freephone 01823 33 42 44

Available Monday to Friday from 10am to 4pm





Greater Manchester Rape Crisis (GMRC)

Call 0161 273 4500

Available Monday to Friday from 10am to 4pm. Wednesday and Thursday 6pm to 9pm



Trafford Rape Crisis

Call 0800 783 4608

Live chat Wed 11.30am-2pm

Available Tuesday and Thursday from 6pm to 9pm. Available Sunday from 3pm to 6pm.



St Mary’s Sexual Assault Referral Centre (SARC)

Call 0161 276 6515 (24 hours)

SARC is for men, women and children living in Greater Manchester or Cheshire who have experienced rape or sexual assault, recently or in the past



Survivors Manchester

Call 0808 500 2222

Now open 24/7

A survivor-run organisation that aims to create and facilitate a safe space for male survivors of sexual abuse and rape to work through personal and painful issues

FIND

FIND UA92 OLD TRAFFORD
UA92 Campus
Brian Statham Way
Old Trafford
Stretford
Manchester
M16 0PU
Contact Us




TRAVELLING TO UA92 Old Trafford
 
BY CAR
If you’re travelling to us by car, use postcode M16 OPU in your sat-nav or Google Maps.
BY TRAM
The Metrolink regularly runs to Old Trafford tram station and is approximately 100 metres away from the UA92 campus. You can find times and routes on the Metrolink website.
BY BUS
Our campus is well linked to several bus routes, including the 278 and X50 from Manchester city centre. Find more timetables and route details over on www.tfgm.com.


BY TRAIN
Manchester rail gateway to the rest of the UK Manchester Piccadilly is just over a 10-minute drive away from campus with Virgin Trains, CrossCountry and National Rail all running to and from the station.
ON YOUR BIKE
Manchester is a Cycle City with plenty of dedicated cycling lanes and routes to help you get by on two wheels. www.tfgm.com offers great resources for journey planning if you’re on your bike, and we have a bike shed on site too for secure lock-up of your bike.
BY COACH
We’re well connected with the rest of the UK by coach, with National Express and Megabus departing from Manchester Central and the Shudehill Interchange: both of which are around a 15-minute drive away from campus and offer student discounts.
BY PLANE
Coming to us from overseas? Manchester Airport is approximately a 20-minute drive away from the UA92 campus with 19 million passengers flying through every year. From here, you can connect onwards by taxi, train or shuttle bus.




UA92 BUSINESS SCHOOL


UA92 Business School
Our game-changing UA92 Business School in the city-centre of Manchester opened in September 2023. As our central hub for enterprise, it will transform the way we deliver our Business and Accounting courses. The campus is in the heart of Manchester’s thriving business district, less than one minute from Salford Central train station, and well connected to the rest of Manchester and beyond.
FIND US
UA92 Business School
Baskerville House
Browncross Street
Manchester UK
M3 5FS

Open in maps



































TRAVELLING TO UA92 BUSINESS SCHOOL
 
BY CAR
If you’re travelling to us by car, use postcode M3 5FS in your sat-nav or Google Maps. The nearest car parks are Browncross Street Car Park, Manchester Bridge Street Car Park and NCP Salford New Bailey.
BY TRAM
The nearest Metrolink station is St Peter’s Square. It’s a 7 minute walk to the UA92 Business School. You can find times and routes on the Metrolink website.
BY BUS
The UA92 Business School is well linked to several bus routes. There’s also a free bus routes around Manchester city centre. Find more timetables and route details over on www.tfgm.com.


BY TRAIN
Salford Central train station is a 1 minute walk from the UA92 Business School. Some of the routes include Manchester Airport, Bolton and Rochdale. Manchester Piccadilly and Manchester Victoria are only a short walk away.
ON YOUR BIKE
Manchester is a Cycle City with plenty of dedicated cycling lanes and routes to help you get by on two wheels. www.tfgm.com offers great resources for journey planning if you’re on your bike, and we have a bike shed on site too for secure lock-up of your bike.
BY COACH
We’re well connected with the rest of the UK by coach, with National Express and Megabus departing from Manchester Central and the Shudehill Interchange: both of which are around a 10-minute walk away from the UA92 Business School and offer student discounts.
BY PLANE
Coming to us from overseas? Manchester Airport is approximately a 20-minute drive away from the UA92 Business School with 19 million passengers flying through every year. From here, you can connect onwards by taxi, train or shuttle bus.

THE UA92 VALUES





WE CARE
About our students, staff and community.





WE’RE BRAVE & BOLD
We lead the way in our decisions and actions.





WE’RE INCLUSIVE
We listen and act. We ensure everyone belongs here.






These 5 pillars represent the principles that guide the way we work …
1.Fired Up
We’re fired up to deliver our mission.
2. Open and Honest
We are transparent in everything we do and provide constructive feedback to each other.
3. Stronger Together
We’re collaborative and work as one in pursuit of our mission.
4. Deliberately Different
We are a creative bunch and love to disrupt HE for the benefit of our students.
5. Unlocking Greatness
We develop and encourage you to become the best version of you.





Need more information?
Have a read of our candidate guide to find out more about UA92, from our values and philosophy to our teaching and campuses.

OUR VISION & PHILOSOPHY
There’s more to success than timing and talent. Tenacity, preparedness, passion, and hard work all play an equally important role. Add commitment, inner fire and the right preparation and you can compete at a level far beyond your inborn potential.
Find out more


OUR FOUNDERS
The pioneering Co-Founders and Partners of UA92 are changing the way we think about higher education. Their aim to disrupt the status quo and challenge the traditional higher educational approach and put personal development at the core of the UA92 experience.
Find out more

STUDY
          AT UA92        





DISCOVER MORE

View Prospectus
Book Open Day
Online Events
How to Apply




DELIBERATELY DIFFERENT APPROACH





DEGREES AWARDED BY LANCASTER UNIVERSITY
A top university which is highly sought after by employers.





INDUSTRY INSPIRED COURSES
Industry partners including Microsoft, Manchester United, KPMG and TalkTalk.





BUILDING SKILLS EMPLOYERS WANT
Our innovative ’92 Programme’ focuses on character and personal development .





NO TRADITIONAL END-OF-YEAR EXAMS
Assessments are practical and competency based where possible.





STUDY IN THE MORNING OR AFTERNOON
Our fixed timetable means you’ll study in the morning, 9am-1pm, or afternoon, 2pm-6pm.





START WHEN YOU’RE READY
Begin your studies in September, November, January, February, April or June.






WONDERING HOW
YOU’LL AFFORD UNI
Get the inside scoop from our team on topics such as personal statement writing and student finance. If you want to find out more about some of our courses, you can join our academic-led sessions spanning the Worlds of Business, Digital, Media and Sport.
Journey to Uni Webinars





EXPLOREOUR COURSES


VIEW ALL






World of Sport


INSPIRE A PASSION FOR SPORT, MOVEMENT AND EXERCISE TO IMPROVE HEALTH AND PERFORMANCE.
Benefit from our strong links with industry partners; Manchester United, Salford City FC and Lancashire Cricket, giving you direct access to real-world experiences and opportunities to learn.
VIEW





World of Media


THE DIFFERENT FORMS OF MEDIA HAVE THE POWER TO INFLUENCE HOW WE THINK, SHAPE OUR RELATIONSHIPS AND MAKE SENSE OF EVERYDAY EVENTS AND EXPERIENCES.
You will learn about the production, consumption and effects of contemporary media and master current digital technologies to create engaging media content in Journalism, Sports Journalism, Media and Communications or Sports Media and Communications.
VIEW





World of Digital


THE DIGITAL TECH INDUSTRY IN THE UK HAS SEEN EXPONENTIAL GROWTH OVER THE LAST DECADE, AND THERE ARE NO SIGNS OF IT SLOWING DOWN.
Digital graduates are in high demand, and our courses provide a gateway into many career options. Co-developed with Microsoft and other industry partners, our digital degrees offer a big emphasis on software development and computer programming.
VIEW





World of Business


STUDY A BUSINESS-RELATED COURSE AT UA92 AND DEVELOP THE CORE SKILLS TO BECOME AN EFFECTIVE FUTURE BUSINESS LEADER.
With input from world-leading organisations like KPMG, TalkTalk and CIMA, you’ll benefit from unique workplace experiences such as insight days, masterclasses and guest lectures. What’s more, the network you create will be infinitely valuable to your future career aspirations.
VIEW







WATCH
 

ROAD TO
GREATNESS
UA92 students share their inspirational stories.
This is how their story began.
This is their Road to Greatness.
STUDENT STORIES




CHOOSE HOW YOU STUDY


3 YEAR FULL-TIME DEGREE
Our deliberately different approach means you will study in the morning or afternoon, giving you the flexibility to work around your other commitments. You will study in blocks, focusing on one subject module at a time and you’ll be assessed at the end of every block so no traditional end-of-year exam.
104 UCAS TARIFF POINTS


2 YEAR ACCELERATED DEGREE
Accelerated degrees are perfect for those who want to complete their studies much faster. You will study 6 modules a year (instead of 4), but you will achieve a full degree awarded by Lancaster University in two years, not three. Plus the overall cost is around 20% less than the standard three-year degrees on offer.
104 UCAS TARIFF POINTS


1 YEAR CERT HE
The equivalent to the first year of a degree. This is a great option if you have some qualifications but don’t meet the entry requirements for our full degree course. Successful completion will guarantee progression onto Year 2 of the applicable degree course at UA92. So you can still complete your degree in 3 years.
64 UCAS TARIFF POINTS






Our Campuses
















OLD TRAFFORD
Home to our Sports, Digital and Media students, you can find the game-changing UA92 Campus in the heart of Old Trafford, Manchester, with Emirates Old Trafford and Manchester United’s world-renowned Theatre of Dreams on our doorstep.

















UA92 BUSINESS SCHOOL
Our game-changing UA92 Business School, located in the heart of Manchester’s thriving business district, opened in September 2023. As our central hub for enterprise, it will transform the way we deliver our Business and Accounting courses.






SO, WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
BOOK AN OPEN DAY





MAKE IT FOR REAL


WE BELIEVE EVERYONE DESERVES THE OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE IT FOR REAL, SO WE OFFER A FREE PACKAGE WORTH £5,000* TO SUPPORT YOU IN ACCESSING HIGHER EDUCATION AND UNLOCKING THE CAREER OF YOUR DREAMS.
*T&Cs apply

Come to an Open Afternoon and discover our deliberately different approach to Higher Education. Join us from 2pm-6pm to delve deeper into our courses; exploring the Worlds of Business, Media, Sport and Digital.

Home / Discover UA92 / News /            UA92 Secure Silver Award in the Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF) 2023




UA92 Secure Silver Award in the Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF) 2023
StudentsNews & Announcements




BACK

UA92 BECOMES THE YOUNGEST HIGHER EDUCATION ESTABLISHMENT TO BE AWARDED SILVER IN INAUGURAL TEACHING EXCELLENCE FRAMEWORK.
University Academy 92 (UA92) has been awarded an overall rating of Silver in the Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF) scheme.
This framework, which is undertaken every four years, is UA92’s biggest national measure of credibility and educational expertise since the higher education establishment’s launch in 2019; validating that its deliberately different approach to higher education is delivering excellent student experience and outcomes.
The Silver overall rating signals that the student experience and student outcomes at UA92 are typically of a very high quality and positions​ the institution as the youngest higher education provider to be awarded Silver.
UA92, founded by Lancaster University and the Class of 92, was rated as achieving student experience and outcomes of typically very high quality.
The Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF) is a national scheme run by the Office for Students (OfS) that aims to encourage higher education providers to improve and deliver excellence in the areas that students care about the most: teaching, learning and achieving positive outcomes from their studies.
The TEF does this by assessing and rating universities and colleges for excellence above a set of minimum requirements for quality and standards. The ratings reflect the extent to which a provider delivers an excellent experience and outcomes for its mix of undergraduate students and across the range of its undergraduate courses and subjects. 228 providers took part in the TEF 2023.
Gary Pritchard, Chief Academic Officer at UA92, said;
“Achieving an Overall Rating of Silver in our first TEF review is a huge achievement. It is unheard of from a higher education institution of our age to receive this accolade so quickly and these results are testament to the expertise of our team – from our professors right through to our administration and wellbeing staff.
“We hope that these results will show students who are considering UA92 as their chosen higher education establishment that we will provide them with excellence across both their academic journey and their overall university experience.”
The TEF results follow previous successes for the establishment, having ranked above the UK average in teaching, learning opportunities, feedback and assessment and academic support, in the 2023 National Student Survey.*
UA92 currently has over 1,000 students enrolled in degree and higher education courses across business, sport, media and digital disciplines at its Old Trafford campus, and its brand new Business School campus, which opened this September in Manchester city centre.
Lobbying to make higher education accessible to all through its founding principles of accessibility, social mobility and inclusivity, more than 21% of UA92 students are from the most disadvantaged areas of the community (national average of 13.5% – UCAS). It has targets to have more students from the most disadvantaged backgrounds than the most advantaged.
*Find out more about what our NSS Results say.
